lines.text:
[to Lacey, holds up a fake, bloody leg]
Hey, uh, I'm goin' into town for a burger. You want one?
Well, if there's anything I can do for your nose, handsome, give me a call.
Is he a faggot or what?
I mean, he's changin' all the time, it's crazy.

[after snorting cocaine]
It's funny to have your nose cold.
Would you like to have sex?
You mean with you or just in general?

[sees Nicky wearing an unbrella hat]
Look at that guy over there. Look at that, Gene Kelly should have one of those things. I'm singin' in a bar.
